features: Vibram® megagrip traverse outsole with enhanced stability area and trail bite heel braking platform
Durable leather uppers for comfort and abrasion resistance in rugged terrain
STB Control System™ delivers torsional rigidity and support without encumbering underfoot cushion
Wide forefoot fit for excellent all day comfort and stability
Weight: Men’s: 13.00 oz / 370 g - Women’s: 10.40 oz / 300 g
Upper: Leather/ 1.5 mm PU Techlite Rand/ Vibram® Rubber Toe Rand
Midsole: Traverse Injection Memlex/ STB control system™
Sole: Vibram® Mega-Grip™ Traverse w/ Impact Brake System™
